You'll laugh and you'll cry.  You'll probably scream a little too.  I love this game.  I watched a few streamers play this and thought to myself, "Self, lets give this game a try".  Am I glad that I did.  I play with a group of friends, which makes it a little better, and we have a blast while trying not to get hung on a hook and eaten by some creepy ass spider from space.

This game will offer you infinite amounts of laughter.
Totally recommended.

I have this game since it first came out.
I was never a hardcore of this game but I was a casual player, every now and then I would play it.
Not anymore, not after all my progress got deleted like nothing, and the support dont even care, emailed them and all I got was a ignore in the face. The game is just going downhill from now on. Crashes, loading problems and now all our progress being deleted for good. And not a single reply to our problems to update us.
May I also say that my account has level 0 characters fully bugged with gigantic trees so I cant even normaly level it up. Screw it.

So deeply dissapointed how the game turned out.

暑假的时候买的，在台式电脑上玩的还挺开心的。现在在笔记本电脑上玩，首先是绿条读条半天，又是connection error，这两关通过了进房间又显示我没通过反作弊程序，挂了VPN进游戏也connection error，反作弊的问题按照评论里的解决了，前两个问题还是有，我隔壁宿舍跟我用的一样的网玩的很流畅，搞来搞去弄了一个多小时，很心烦。
这游戏好吓人而且好难呀。。。玩了39分钟以后我决定退款

是一个好游戏，但是有些玩家素质实在是吃屎，只许自己人皇遛鬼，不许自己脑子进水怼瞎杀人鬼直接救人，我正对着钩子上的人，你丫一救人我听声音直接三段效果拉下地，一局拉了两次，还送他上了树，于是就加我好友开骂，这个素质，真是没谁了，我做鬼又不是没被闪现高速四红20段人皇一秒甩出一屏幕 ，我都没说什么，更不要说加好友骂人了。
玻璃心的玩家，这游戏不适合你，真的。
最后，制作组你能不能强化一下针对改档和作弊的处罚？ 现在就算是封号了，STEAM新建小号家庭共享一下又是20段的四红人皇（鬼王）天尊，你让萌新天天吃灰，萌新又不是傻逼，会花钱买你的游戏找罪受吗？
推荐这游戏，好玩。

This is the only game where even when I'm winning I still feel like I'm losing.
Also, the past events were incredibly mediocre like they barely care anymore about things that don't make them a profit directly. For example, the Anniversary event was awful (some funny quotes and bonus bloodpoints don't count guys...) and the Halloween event was so lazy I don't even know how I had the power to even get the rewards after being baited like that thinking it would be at least decent. 
If you are someone that likes events or different activities in games and likes to be entertained by diversity then go somewhere else because this is the place where creativity and engagingness come to die.

Má to hodně plusů i mínusů ale určitě je plusů více ale nelíbilo se mi dlouhé a občas obtížné pripojování ke hře. Vždy když jsem se chtěl připojit tak mě to házelo do základního menu abych hledal lobby ale pokaždé se to vypnulo a až po restartu hry to jelo. Ale hodně se mi líbí že tam nejsou rankedy a že můžete mít rank už od začátku, nejsou tam nějaké rozzařovací hry jako je v RL, CS:GO či LoL.
Expensive
bug多，经常connection error，进房间经常卡住，重启游戏没用，开VPN没用，文件完整性检测也没用，eac服务改成自动也没用。每次重启电脑才能进去游戏，进去以后进房间的时候又高几率卡住只显示一个logo，差评
考虑再三还是买了 趁着打折 可能之后也不会经常玩倒是 但是游戏很好 很欢乐 就是EAC麻烦 如果报错 看是写房主未通过反作弊检测还是你 房主的话不用管  另开一局 如果是你的问题进C:\Windows\SysWOW64 找EasyAntiCheat.exe 删掉 进steam右键游戏  最下属性 验证游戏完整性然后会报错自动再把EAC装上 进游戏就好了 改档开挂是不好 但是游戏还是好游戏

Чтож, дамы и господа, сегодня на ваше обозрение выноситься игра Dead by Daylight, что можно скачать о геймплее, Игра-симулятор лобби, после 20 минут ожидания игры, маньяк выходит и ты с друзьями ждёшь игру ещё 20 минут, что ещё можно сказать, много маньяков, кто-то балансен, а кто-то нет, хорошая озвучка, в главной роли которой: хрюкающая свинья, чайка, еб0нутый батя алкоголик и многие другие, так же в этой игре вы столкнётесь с вечным нытьём маньяков и сурвов о том, что  кто-то имбалансен, кто-то токсичен и просто неуловим, так же множно увидить множество забавных багов с застреванием в шкафу и текстурах, а так же можно почувствовать себя суперменом и улететь за карту, вообщем что же всё таки можно сказать об игре? Тут вы можите быть супергероем способным летать сквозь пространство и время, а можите быть дегенератом в 47ю хромосомами и с заведённой пилой читать лекции в подвале висящему сурву, на этом всё, да прибудет с вами присвятой палетлуп и фейскемпинг с фонарём)

DO NOT BUY THIS GAME

If you're like me and had friends telling you to buy this game and they're saying it's great don't listen to them. Maybe get it on sale for cheap but it's not worth it. Sure the game at it's core is cool and really fun however it has that many game breaking bugs that the devs won't fix, paid dlc that's not worth it and I don't think they deserve that money until they get their shit together, 0 official servers so it doesn't cost them anything to keep the game going and since it's peer hosting easy to get lag switched or just people with bad internet. Core mechanics don't work properly yet, the button mapping is off in some cases, it looks pretty average and looking at textures close up they look garbage, very few things are balanced and you can tell the devs love killers and play killer themselves. I could go on for ages but there's a lot of reviews and threads talking about this.

To sum everything up DO NOT BUY THIS GAME... yet. Wait and see if the devs get their shit together but at the minute they're trying to sell the game as fully released when it is nowhere near it, it needs a lot of work. You would see a lot of the negative reviews would'nt be here if they didn't say the game is fully released because the stage it is in is that of what you'd excpect of something in beta or maybe even late alpha

I played over the fre weekend and loved it. Great concept for a game. 
However there are quite alot of bugs that need to be ironed out.
The most pressing being that match making and lobby waiting times can get ridiculous.

I'm sick and tierd of developers releasing unfinished games because they have 'potential' and i've been stung by this before.
For that reason in its current state i'd say it's not worth the buy.
I thoroughly enjoyed the game and will definetly buy it when its finished.

Dead by Daylight offers a great thrill ride especially when the killer is right on your heels and you have to plan a cunning root to get away from him. Both sides are great to play and keep dragging you back for more games. 

My negatives are the queueing can take a very long time if you try and queue with your friends which is annoying and also some times you queue and it takes you back to the home screen.

If you are looking for something to get the adrenaline going then i recommend this game :)

mne nejde spustit

Jogo sensacional, recomendo muito. Hoje em dia não encontra-se muitos campers, mas quando tem, dó de quem está no gancho rs. Poderia ter algum mecanísmo do próprio jogo de aumentar a velocidade de reparo se o killer estiver próximo do cara que está no gancho, para evitar esses problemas. É complicado, killer tem muita vantagem, o sobrevivente precisa entender locais infinitos, onde o killer perderá muito tempo atrás de um cara enquanto os outros fazem geradores. Cada sobrevivente precisa se especializar em tal tarefa no jogo. No inicio, todos começam destruindo 1 gancho perto onde nasce e já começa os geradores, isso deixa OP contra o killer, sempre bom ter um para correr, outro para curar, outro para sabotar e outro para os geradores. Sabendo lidar com o sistema do jogo, dá para equilibrar, não é facil sobreviver se o killer é bom, ainda mais se estiver com o famoso apelão Doctor, que descobre você a kilômetros atrás de uma arvore, este killer quebrou este sistema de pique esconde, armários ajudam a não gritar, mas se o killer já sabe disso, ele vai olhar todos, outro killer complicado de se lidar é o espectro, por você não saber que ele está chegando estando invisivel e sem sinais cardíacos, uma lanterna e o perk frio na espinha servirá bem, a única forma de ajudar seus amigos é ocupa-lo. Mas no entanto, você que é novato e está lendo comentários para saber se vale a pena comprar, digo que sim, pelo motivo do jogo ser online por partidas que sempre são diferentes, com mapas, killer e sobreviventes diferentes com infinitos perks para se utilizar. Bom jogo !

It used to be a good game on release, now it's dogshit. If you buy the game, you'll also need to buy all the DLC or get owned by overpowered killers. They needed more money apparently so they made the purchase-only killers and survivors more broken than I could ever imagine.

80% of killers just camp the hooks and survivors don't care about your safety on rescues, they will take the points and run. Ranks full reset each month, so you need to play with the worst possible players for 10-20 games each month. No thanks. Added to "shitty games that I still play" category in steam.

It could still be fun in a "friends only" setting.

a great  game with a new look on horror. i have never seen a game like this before. it's good alone but much better with some friends. its a great game but there are some bugs. the menu screen and matchmaking is all over the place and if the killer has bad internet it ruins the match. i would say its a great game for only 20 dollars very fun if you look over the small bugs

И так, игра бомба, сначала на бедке играл, потом купил. Сравнить бедку и то, что есть сейчас, оптимизация какая ни какая появилась за это время, правда без всяких мануалов по повышению FPS не обошлось) Я за то, что дополнения были платными, а так же, за то, чтобы все же доделаи оптимизацию и пофиксили баги (достаточно их). Купил всех маньяков и жду еше одного) Советую всем поиграть с друзьями-это весело) А и еще мансите и кемперите, и у маньяка и у выживших пукан гореть будет только так, иногда кажется, что ради этого и играю)
